title: Huawei Watch_How can I adjust the length of the strap?
answer:
• Stainless steel mesh strap: Adjust the strap according to the circumference of your wrist.
  • Leather strap: Adjust the strap according to the circumference of your wrist. If the strap does not fit properly using the holes provided, take your watch to your local watch repair shop to have more holes punched into the strap.
  • Stainless steel link bracelet: A special tool is needed to adjust the bracelet. Take your watch to your local watch repair shop to have it adjusted or you can order an adjustment tool yourself from many online retailers.
